article.title: GalaxyAdmins Future Directions
article.content:
The GalaxyAdmins group is coming up on it's one year anniversary and this is a good time to discuss where the group should go moving forward. See the GalaxyAdmins Future Directions page for a summary of issues, including:

  • Goals and Activities
  • Leadership Models and Selection
  • and a summary of the group's history.

These topics are currently being discussed in email thread. Whatever consensus and plan we reach will be posted to the wiki page. Ideally we should have a plan of action in place before GCC2103 at the end of June.

Dave Clements
